metadata.title: Register Your Pet Business | CutiePawsPedia
metadata.description: Register your pet business on CutiePawsPedia and reach thousands of pet owners.

page.title: Register Your Pet Business
page.subtitle: Join thousands of pet businesses on CutiePawsPedia
page.cancelledPayment: Payment cancelled. You can try again or choose a different plan.

planStep.title: Choose Your Plan
planStep.description: Start free and upgrade anytime. All plans include reviews.

businessStep.title: Tell Us About Your Business
businessStep.description: This information will be shown on your business profile.
businessStep.searchHint: Type to search for your existing listing
businessStep.businessDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell pet owners about your services...

dashboard.selectBusinessDesc: You have multiple businesses. Choose which one to manage.
dashboard.noBusinessesDesc: You don't have any businesses linked to your account yet.
dashboard.upgradeForAnalytics: Upgrade to Starter to unlock analytics
dashboard.upgradeForAdvanced: Upgrade to Pro for advanced analytics
dashboard.advertisingDesc: Reach more customers with sponsored ads on our website
dashboard.noCampaignsDesc: Start your first ad campaign and reach thousands of pet owners.
dashboard.startAdvertisingToday: Start advertising today and grow your business!
dashboard.createYourAd: Create your ad and start promoting
dashboard.selectPackage: Select a package from the form
dashboard.destinationUrlDesc: Where visitors go when they click
dashboard.youWillPay: You'll pay {price} for {days} days of advertising
dashboard.creditsDesc: Your credit balance and transaction history
dashboard.noTransactionsDesc: When you purchase credits or receive leads, your transactions will appear here.
dashboard.stripeComingSoonDesc: In the next phase, you'll be able to purchase credits directly via Stripe. Stay tuned!
dashboard.subscriptionDesc: Manage your subscription and view available features
dashboard.reviewsNote: Receive, display, and respond to reviews on any plan
dashboard.stripeNote: All payments are securely processed by Stripe.
dashboard.reviewsAndRepliesDesc: Notifications when you get new reviews or replies
dashboard.favoritePlacesDesc: Updates when your saved places have new information
dashboard.leadNotificationsDesc: Get notified when someone contacts your business
dashboard.businessUpdatesDesc: Claim approvals, status changes, and more
dashboard.weeklyDigestDesc: Weekly summary of your activity and favorites

blog.metaTitle: Blog - Tips & Advice for Pet Owners | CutiePawsPedia
blog.metaDescription: Discover the best tips, advice and stories for pet owners. Learn about care, training, health and more.
blog.title: Tips & Advice
blog.subtitle: Discover helpful tips, expert advice and interesting stories for you and your pet.
blog.noArticlesDesc: We're working on new content. Check back soon!

editorial.name: CutiePawsPedia Editorial
editorial.tooltip: This information has been reviewed by our editorial team of pet care experts.

categoryPages.name: Name
categoryPages.notRegisteredYet: No {category} have been registered in {location} yet.
categoryPages.rankingBased: Ranking based on average ratings and number of reviews.
categoryPages.notEnoughReviews: There are not enough {category} with reviews in {location} yet.
categoryPages.claimDescription: Submit your claim to manage this business listing. Our team will review your request within 2-3 business days.

profile.privateProfileDesc: This user has chosen to keep their profile private.
profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your public profile, badges, and karma level.
profile.name: Display Name
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and your pets...
profile.bioHelp: A short bio that appears on your public profile
profile.profileVisibilityHelp: When enabled, other users can view your profile and reviews
profile.error: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
profile.trustLevelSubtitle: Your reputation in the community based on your contributions
profile.badgesSubtitle: Achievements you've earned through your contributions
profile.noBadgesYet: No badges available yet. Keep contributing to earn badges!

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone
deleteAccount.warning1: Your profile, reviews, and all account data will be permanently deleted
deleteAccount.warning2: Your saved places and viewing history will be removed
deleteAccount.warning3: Any businesses you own will be deleted along with their leads and messages
deleteAccount.warning4: Your badges and karma points will be lost
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.emailMismatch: Email does not match your account email
deleteAccount.error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
deleteAccount.subscriptionWarning: If you have an active business subscription, please cancel it first in your Business Dashboard under 'Manage Plan' before deleting your account. Otherwise, you may continue to be charged.

favorites.title: Saved Places
favorites.description: You have {count, plural, =0 {no saved places yet} one {# saved place} other {# saved places}}.
favorites.emptyDescription: Start exploring pet care places and save your favorites by clicking the heart icon on any listing.

recentViews.title: Recently Viewed
recentViews.description: Your {count, plural, =0 {viewing history is empty} one {# most recently viewed place} other {# most recently viewed places}}.
recentViews.emptyDescription: Start exploring pet care places and your viewing history will appear here.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Manage your email preferences. Choose which types of emails you want to receive.
notifications.reviewsRepliesDesc: Notifications when you receive reviews or replies
notifications.leadsInquiriesDesc: New customer inquiries for your business
notifications.businessUpdatesDesc: Claim status, verification, and business-related emails
notifications.weeklyDigestDesc: Weekly summary of your business activity

footer.newsletterDescription: Get the latest pet care tips and news delivered to your inbox.
footer.tagline: Your trusted guide to finding the best pet services near you.
footer.affiliateDisclosure: CutiePawsPedia may earn a commission from affiliate links. This does not affect our recommendations.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Discover trusted veterinarians, groomers, pet shops, and more in your area.
homepage.veterinariansDesc: Expert care for your furry friends
homepage.searchDesc: Find pet services near you by category or location
homepage.tipHealthyPuppy: How to Keep Your Puppy Healthy
homepage.tipHealthyPuppyDesc: Essential tips for new puppy owners
homepage.tipBestGroomerDesc: What to look for when choosing a groomer
homepage.faqFreeAnswer: Yes! Searching and browsing pet services is completely free for pet owners.
homepage.faqVerifyAnswer: We verify business information through multiple sources and encourage owner claims.
homepage.faqReviewAnswer: Absolutely! Sign in to leave reviews and help other pet owners make informed decisions.
homepage.faqListQuestion: How do I list my business?
homepage.faqListAnswer: Click 'List Your Business' and follow the simple steps to create your free listing.
homepage.faqCountriesAnswer: We currently support Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany, with more coming soon.
homepage.getFoundByOwners: Get found by pet owners actively looking for services like yours.
homepage.petGuideSubtitle: Practical tips and advice for the best care of your pet

claim.title: Claim This Business

business.title: Grow Your Pet Business with CutiePawsPedia
business.subtitle: Connect with pet owners actively searching for services like yours. Choose a plan that fits your needs.

step1.title: Claim Your Listing
step1.description: Find your business and claim it for free. Start with our Free plan.

step2.title: Choose Your Plan
step2.description: Upgrade anytime to unlock photos, contact info, and better visibility.

step3.title: Grow Your Business
step3.description: Get discovered by pet owners and build trust with reviews.

reviewNotice.title: All plans include reviews
reviewNotice.description: Receive, display, and respond to customer reviews on any plan - even Free!

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your business. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.

users.title: Targeted Audience
users.description: Reach pet owners actively searching for services in their area

trending.title: Grow Your Business
trending.description: Higher plans get priority placement in search results

shield.title: Build Trust
shield.description: Showcase authentic customer reviews and ratings

chart.title: Track Performance
chart.description: See how many people view your listing and engage with it

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of pet businesses already on CutiePawsPedia

enterprise.title: Enterprise & Multi-Location
enterprise.description: Managing multiple locations or need custom solutions? Let's talk.

comparison.title: {category} {city1} vs {city2}: Comparison {year}
comparison.metaDescription: Compare {category} in {city1} and {city2}. Discover which city offers better pet services in terms of ratings, options, and quality.
comparison.subtitle: Find out where the best pet services are located
comparison.verdictCity1Wins: Based on our analysis, {city1} has a slight advantage for {category}.
comparison.verdictCity2Wins: Based on our analysis, {city2} has a slight advantage for {category}.
comparison.verdictTie: Both cities have excellent {category} with comparable quality and options.
comparison.faqTitle: Frequently asked questions about {category} in {city1} and {city2}
comparison.faq2Question: Where can I find the best rated {category}?
comparison.faq2Answer: The best rated {category} can be found in {winner} with an average rating of {rating}.
comparison.faq3Question: Are there verified {category} in these cities?
comparison.faq3Answer: Yes, {city1} has {verified1} verified businesses and {city2} has {verified2} verified businesses.

provinceTopPages.rankingMethodology: Ranking based on average ratings and number of reviews. Updated monthly.

stats.topCityFact: {city} is the city with the most {category} ({count} locations).
stats.avgPerProvinceFact: There are on average {avg} {category} per province.
stats.highQualityFact: {percentage}% of {category} have a rating of 4 stars or higher.
stats.premiumFact: {count} businesses have a premium listing for extra visibility.
stats.exploreCta: Browse all {count} {category} in {country} and find the perfect match for your pet.

mapPages.countryMapDescription: Interactive map showing all pet services in {country}. Find veterinarians, groomers, pet stores and more near you.
mapPages.cityMapDescription: Interactive map showing all pet services in {city}, {country}. Find veterinarians, groomers, pet stores and more near you.
mapPages.countryCategoryMapDescription: Interactive map showing all {category} in {country}. Find the best {category} near you.
mapPages.exploreOnMap: Explore Pet Services on the Map in {location}
mapPages.mapDescription: Browse {count} pet services on our interactive map in {location}. Click on markers to see details and get directions.
mapPages.categoryMapDescription: Find all {count} {category} on our interactive map in {location}. Compare locations and find the best one for your pet.

newAdditions.intro: Discover the newest pet services in {country}. Browse recently added veterinarians, groomers, pet shops and more. Stay up to date with new openings near you.
newAdditions.introSecondary: There are {count} new locations added in the past months.
newAdditions.categoryIntro: Discover newly opened {category} in {country}. Find recently added businesses and be one of the first to visit them.
newAdditions.noNewAdditionsDesc: No new pet services have been added in {country} in the last {days} days.
newAdditions.noNewAdditionsCategoryDesc: No new {category} have been added in {country} in the last {days} days.
newAdditions.ctaDescription: Get weekly updates about new pet services in {country}. Be the first to hear about new openings.
newAdditions.ctaDescriptionCategory: Get notified when new {category} are added in {country}.

dogFoodCalculator.title: Dog Food Calculator
dogFoodCalculator.subtitle: Calculate how much food your dog needs per day
dogFoodCalculator.description: This calculator determines your dog's daily calorie needs based on scientifically-backed formulas (RER/MER) used by veterinarians worldwide.

results.title: Results
results.note: This is an estimate based on average food values. Always check the packaging of your specific food.

disclaimer.title: Important information
disclaimer.text: This calculator provides an estimate based on scientific formulas. Individual needs can vary by up to 50%. Always consult a veterinarian for specific dietary advice, especially with health issues or obesity.
